nodes.text: In 6 BBY the Partisans undertook a mission to the Mid Rim planet Inusagi.

Saw Gerrera was hired by Arane Oreida for this mission. Using invitations forged by Jyn Erso, Saw and his partisans infiltrated the Sakoola blossom festival on Inusagi accompanied by Arane and her partisans. When they entered through the chieftess's palace, they massacred all the guests at the festival using flechette launchers. One of Saw's partisans, Maia, was killed during the mission.
